mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET emp_pw= PASSWORD(#{newPw}) WHERE emp_no= #{empNo} AND emp_pw= PASSWORD(#{oldPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee(emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name)VALUES(#{empId}, PASSWORD(#{empPw}), #{empName});
mapper.select: SELECT emp_id empId, emp_name empName, emp_no empNo FROM employee WHERE emp_id= #{empId} AND emp_pw=PASSWORD(#{empPw})
